entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 04:00 AM AST Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.3°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -3.2°C

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow this morning. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow changing to light snow this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
